sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.MNG_MT ,T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,T1.MNG_SEQ ,T1.REQEST_SEQ ,T1.ENTRPSCD ,T4.ENTRPS_NM ,T3.MNG_FEE_SJ ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.USAGE_AR,0),'999,990.00')) AS USAGE_AR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.MNG_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MNG_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.ELCTY_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS ELCTY_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.WATER_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS WATER_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.GAS_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS GAS_FEE ,'0' AS ENV_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.MNG_TOTAL_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MNG_TOTAL_FEE ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) || '-' || SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) AS MNG_YR_MT ,(CASE WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='M' THEN '[M]:마린센터' WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='E' THEN '[E]:전기시설' ELSE '[' || T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE || ']:' || 'UNKNOWN' END) AS MNG_FEE_JOB_SE_NM ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) AS MNG_MT_YEAR ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) AS MNG_MT_MON ,T1.PRT_AT_CODE ,T1.CHRGE_KND ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM024',T1.CHRGE_KND) AS CHRGE_KND_NM ,T1.ACCNUT_YEAR ,T1.NTIC_NO ,TO_CHAR(T1.NTIC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NTIC_DT ,TO_CHAR(T1.PAY_TMLMT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PAY_TMLMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS FEE ,T1.VAT_YN ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM016',T1.VAT_YN) AS VAT_YN_NM ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.VAT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS VAT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.NTIC_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS NTIC_AMT ,T1.RCIV_SE ,(CASE WHEN T1.NHT_ISUE_YN='Y' THEN GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM025',T1.RCIV_SE) ELSE '미고지' END) AS RCIV_SE_NM ,TO_CHAR(T1.RCIV_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RCIV_DT ,T1.NHT_ISUE_YN ,T1.NHT_PRINT_YN ,T1.ADIT_NTIC_YN ,T1.ARRRG_NO ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(T1.ARRRG_AMT,'999,999,999,990')) AS ARRRG_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(T1.ARRRG_TARIFF,'0.000')) AS ARRRG_TARIFF ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(T1.ARRRG_PAY_DATES,'999,990')) AS ARRRG_PAY_DATES ,T1.RM ,T1.DEPT_CD ,T1.REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,T1.UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT ,T5.FEE_TP ,T5.FISCAL_YR ,T5.BILL_NO ,T5.RCVD_TP FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F T2 ON (T1.MNG_MT=T2.MNG_MT AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T2.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE AND T1.MNG_SEQ=T2.MNG_SEQ) LEFT OUTER JOIN FCLTS_MNG_FEE_F T3 ON (T1.MNG_MT=T3.MNG_MT AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T3.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ENTRPS_INFO_F T4 ON (T1.ENTRPSCD=T4.ENTRPSCD) LEFT OUTER JOIN REV_COLL_F T5 ON (T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T5.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.CHRGE_KND=T5.WORK_CODE AND T1.ACCNUT_YEAR=T5.FISCAL_YR AND T1.NTIC_NO=T5.BILL_NO) WHERE 1=1
AND T1.MNG_MT >= #sStartMngYear# || #sStartMngMt#
AND T1.MNG_MT >= #sStartMngYear# || '01'
AND T1.MNG_MT <= #sEndMngYear# || #sEndMngMt#
AND T1.MNG_MT <= #sEndMngYear# || '12'
AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #sMngFeeJobSe#
AND T1.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
AND T1.NTIC_DT >= TO_DATE(#sStartNticDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND T1.NTIC_DT < TO_DATE(#sEndNticDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND T1.RCIV_SE = #sRcivSe#
AND T1.CHRGE_KND = #sChrgeKnd#
ORDER BY T1.MNG_MT,T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE,T1.NTIC_DT ) S ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(COUNT(*),'999,999,999,990')) AS DATA_COUNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(FEE),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(VAT),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_VAT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(NTIC_AMT),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_NTIC_AMT FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F WHERE 1=1
AND MNG_MT >= #sStartMngYear# || #sStartMngMt#
AND MNG_MT >= #sStartMngYear# || '01'
AND MNG_MT <= #sEndMngYear# || #sEndMngMt#
AND MNG_MT <= #sEndMngYear# || '12'
AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #sMngFeeJobSe#
AND ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
AND NTIC_DT >= TO_DATE(#sStartNticDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND NTIC_DT < TO_DATE(#sEndNticDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND RCIV_SE = #sRcivSe#
AND CHRGE_KND = #sChrgeKnd#

SELECT T1.MNG_MT ,T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,T1.MNG_SEQ ,T1.REQEST_SEQ ,T1.ENTRPSCD ,(CASE WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='M' THEN '[M]:마린센터' WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='E' THEN '[E]:전기시설' ELSE '[' || T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE || ']:' || 'UNKNOWN' END) AS MNG_FEE_JOB_SE_NM ,T1.PRT_AT_CODE ,T1.CHRGE_KND ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM024',T1.CHRGE_KND) AS CHRGE_KND_NM ,T1.ACCNUT_YEAR ,T1.NTIC_NO ,TO_CHAR(T1.NTIC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NTIC_DT ,TO_CHAR(T1.PAY_TMLMT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PAY_TMLMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS FEE ,T1.VAT_YN ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM016',T1.VAT_YN) AS VAT_YN_NM ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.VAT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS VAT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.NTIC_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS NTIC_AMT ,T1.RCIV_SE ,(CASE WHEN T1.NHT_ISUE_YN='Y' THEN GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM025',T1.RCIV_SE) ELSE '미고지' END) AS RCIV_SE_NM ,TO_CHAR(T1.RCIV_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RCIV_DT ,T1.NHT_ISUE_YN ,T1.NHT_PRINT_YN ,T1.ADIT_NTIC_YN ,T1.ARRRG_NO ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(T1.ARRRG_AMT,'999,999,999,990')) AS ARRRG_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(T1.ARRRG_TARIFF,'0.000')) AS ARRRG_TARIFF ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(T1.ARRRG_PAY_DATES,'999,990')) AS ARRRG_PAY_DATES ,T1.RM ,T1.DEPT_CD ,T1.REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,T1.UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F T1 WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# ORDER BY T1.REQEST_SEQ

SELECT T1.MNG_MT ,T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,T1.MNG_SEQ ,T1.REQEST_SEQ ,T1.ENTRPSCD ,T4.ENTRPS_NM ,T4.BIZRNO ,T4.RPRSNTV_NM ,T4.ADRES ,T4.ADRES2 ,T4.ZIP ,T3.MNG_FEE_SJ ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.USAGE_AR,0),'999,990.00')) AS USAGE_AR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.MNG_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MNG_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.ELCTY_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS ELCTY_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.WATER_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS WATER_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.GAS_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS GAS_FEE ,'0' AS ENV_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.MNG_TOTAL_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MNG_TOTAL_FEE ,(CASE WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='M' THEN '[M]:마린센터' WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='E' THEN '[E]:전기시설' ELSE '[' || T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE || ']:' || 'UNKNOWN' END) AS MNG_FEE_JOB_SE_NM ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) AS MNG_MT_YEAR ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) AS MNG_MT_MON ,T1.PRT_AT_CODE ,T1.CHRGE_KND ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM024',T1.CHRGE_KND) AS CHRGE_KND_NM ,T1.ACCNUT_YEAR ,T1.NTIC_NO ,TO_CHAR(T1.NTIC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NTIC_DT ,TO_CHAR(T1.PAY_TMLMT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PAY_TMLMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS FEE ,T1.VAT_YN ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM016',T1.VAT_YN) AS VAT_YN_NM ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.VAT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS VAT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.NTIC_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS NTIC_AMT ,T1.NHT_ISUE_YN ,T1.NHT_PRINT_YN ,T1.ADIT_NTIC_YN ,T1.ARRRG_NO ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(T1.ARRRG_AMT,'999,999,999,990')) AS ARRRG_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(T1.ARRRG_TARIFF,'0.000')) AS ARRRG_TARIFF ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(T1.ARRRG_PAY_DATES,'999,990')) AS ARRRG_PAY_DATES ,P2MGR.SF_MAKEDIGIT@YGPA_P2MGR(T1.PRT_AT_CODE || ASCII(SUBSTR(T5.FEE_TP,1,1)) || SUBSTR(T5.FEE_TP,2,1) || T1.ACCNUT_YEAR || T1.NTIC_NO || NVL(T1.ARRRG_NO,'0'),'BILLNO') AS CSTMR_REF_CODE ,DECODE(T1.PRT_AT_CODE,'620','1','621','2','3') || T5.FEE_TP_MAP || SUBSTR(T1.ACCNUT_YEAR,3,2) || T1.NTIC_NO || NVL(T1.ARRRG_NO,'00') AS ELEC_PAY_NO ,DECODE(T1.PRT_AT_CODE,'622','6374594','6374604') AS GIRO_NO ,P2MGR.SF_MAKEDIGIT@YGPA_P2MGR(T1.NTIC_AMT,'AMT') AS ELEC_NTIC_AMT ,'01' AS NTIC_CNT FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F T2 ON (T1.MNG_MT=T2.MNG_MT AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T2.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE AND T1.MNG_SEQ=T2.MNG_SEQ) LEFT OUTER JOIN FCLTS_MNG_FEE_F T3 ON (T1.MNG_MT=T3.MNG_MT AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T3.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ENTRPS_INFO_F T4 ON (T1.ENTRPSCD=T4.ENTRPSCD) LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.FEE_TP_F@YGPA_P2MGR T5 ON (T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T5.PRT_AT_CODE AND GAM_GET_FEE_TP(T1.CHRGE_KND)=T5.FEE_TP) WHERE T1.MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND T1.MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND T1.REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#

SELECT T1.MNG_MT ,T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,T1.MNG_SEQ ,T1.REQEST_SEQ ,T1.ENTRPSCD ,T1.PRT_AT_CODE ,T1.CHRGE_KND ,GAM_GET_FEE_TP(T1.CHRGE_KND) AS FEE_TP ,T1.ACCNUT_YEAR ,T1.NTIC_NO ,TO_CHAR(T1.NTIC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NTIC_DT ,TO_CHAR(T1.PAY_TMLMT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PAY_TMLMT ,NVL(T1.FEE,0) AS FEE ,T1.VAT_YN ,NVL(T1.VAT,0) AS VAT ,NVL(T1.NTIC_AMT,0) AS NTIC_AMT ,T1.NHT_ISUE_YN ,T1.NHT_PRINT_YN ,T1.ADIT_NTIC_YN ,T1.ARRRG_NO ,NVL(T1.ARRRG_AMT,0) AS ARRRG_AMT FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F T1 WHERE T1.MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND T1.MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND T1.REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F SET CHRGE_KND = #chrgeKnd#
,ACCNUT_YEAR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') ,NTIC_NO = (SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(TO_NUMBER(MAX(BILL_NO)),0) + 1,'000000')) FROM REV_COLL_F WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = #prtAtCode# AND FEE_TP = GAM_GET_FEE_TP(#chrgeKnd#) AND FISCAL_YR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')) ,NTIC_DT = TO_DATE(#nticDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,PAY_TMLMT = TO_DATE(#payTmlmt#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
,ACCNUT_YEAR = NULL ,NTIC_NO = NULL ,NTIC_DT = NULL ,PAY_TMLMT = NULL
,FEE = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#fee#,',','')) ,VAT_YN = #vatYn# ,VAT = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#vat#,',','')) ,NTIC_AMT = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#nticAmt#,',','')) ,RM = #rm#
,NHT_ISUE_YN = #nhtIsueYn# ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#
UPDATE MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F SET NHT_PRINT_YN = #nhtPrintYn# WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO REV_COLL_F ( PRT_AT_CODE ,FEE_TP ,WORK_CODE ,FISCAL_YR ,BILL_NO ,AGENT_CODE ,BZ_RGST_ID ,AGENT_NAME ,BILL_DT ,DUE_DATE ,BILL_PRT_YN ,FIRST_BILL_DT ,BILL_AMNT ,VAT_YN ,VAT ,OVER_AMNT ,DC_AMNT ,AMNT_RSN ,DEPT ,EMPL ,USER_NAME ,RCVD_TP ,UPDT_UID ,UPDT_DATE ) SELECT T1.PRT_AT_CODE ,GAM_GET_FEE_TP(T1.CHRGE_KND) ,T1.CHRGE_KND ,T1.ACCNUT_YEAR ,T1.NTIC_NO ,T1.ENTRPSCD ,T2.BIZRNO ,T2.ENTRPS_NM ,T1.NTIC_DT ,T1.PAY_TMLMT ,NVL(T1.NHT_PRINT_YN,'N') ,T1.NTIC_DT ,T1.FEE ,T1.VAT_YN ,T1.VAT ,0 ,0 ,#mngFeeSj# ,T1.DEPT_CD ,#updUsr# ,#userName# ,'0' ,#updUsr# ,SYSDATE FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ENTRPS_INFO_F T2 ON (T1.ENTRPSCD=T2.ENTRPSCD) WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REV_COLL_F SET BILL_PRT_YN = #billPrtYn# WHERE (PRT_AT_CODE, FEE_TP, FISCAL_YR, BILL_NO) = (SELECT PRT_AT_CODE, GAM_GET_FEE_TP(CHRGE_KND), ACCNUT_YEAR, NTIC_NO FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM REV_COLL_F WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = #prtAtCode# AND FEE_TP = GAM_GET_FEE_TP(#chrgeKnd#) AND FISCAL_YR = #accnutYear# AND BILL_NO = #nticNo#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE UNPAID_F SET DLY_BILL_PRT_YN = #billPrtYn# WHERE (PRT_AT_CODE, FEE_TP, FISCAL_YR, BILL_NO, DLY_SER_NO) = (SELECT PRT_AT_CODE, GAM_GET_FEE_TP(CHRGE_KND), ACCNUT_YEAR, NTIC_NO, ARRRG_NO FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#)
